MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Wickham Close, Belle Vue Road and surrounding area. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area earlier today and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site continuing to investigate the cause of the fault and have managed to restore power to a number of properties. They will now work to restore power to all remaining  properties as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:05PM on Saturday 23rd January 2021
